post.body: @intoablurrysky I'll drink to that. Sláinte!
By the way I suggest lots of brandy... it's actually been working for me. Feeling a bit better today at least.
@fingerslinger HAHAHA! She's got to let the girls out.
I didn't exactly mean undead, more like I'd been roofied. Spent yesterday in a daze. Thinking about staying drug-free 2day ;)
Ha. I tried all that for my cold, too. :) None of it worked though. Back to the drawing board I guess.
Congrats! That's awesome!
Yep. Almost makes up for being sick.
Damn. Luckily I can still breathe, but I have a sore throat and my head feels heavy. Boo.
Man, I still can't believe they tried to ruin X-mas like that. Also, it was good seeing you, too.
Skål!
It's been a Fable 2 kind of day.
I hate taking cold medicine. It always makes me feel like a zombie.
Going to the store for cold medicine... whoo?
Nothing quite like some Die Hard on Christmas.
Having a cold on X-mas blows... but watching Willow for the first time since I was a kid was rad.
Just watched Bad Santa. Awesome.
Drinking eggnog & watching my kitten go crazy over her new toys. Merry Christmas everyone!
I think I'm getting sick... yay, just in time for X-mas. I should probably make another cup of tea.
You'd think I'd be sick of The Nutcracker by now, but I just can't get enough of the Russian dude dancing around in his ballet shoes.
Just bought Freakazoid! Season 1 and am pretty excited about it. Freak out!
